name: skills-marketplace
description: A marketplace of Claude Agent Skills for various tasks

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Create new Claude Agent Skills through interactive guidance. Use when asked to create a skill, build a skill, make a new skill, or help with skill development.

plugins.name: code-reviewer
plugins.description: Review code for quality, security, and best practices. Use when asked to review code, find bugs, or suggest improvements.

plugins.name: markdown-formatter
plugins.description: Format and structure content as clean, well-organized Markdown. Use when asked to create documentation, format text, or generate Markdown output.

plugins.name: meeting-notes
plugins.description: Structure meeting transcripts into organized notes with action items, decisions, and key points. Use when processing meeting recordings or creating meeting summaries.

plugins.name: json-schema
plugins.description: Generate and validate JSON Schema definitions. Use when asked to create schemas, validate JSON structure, or document API payloads.

plugins.name: swiftui-developer
plugins.description: Develop SwiftUI applications for iOS and macOS following Apple Human Interface Guidelines, modern architecture patterns (MVVM, @Observable), and performance best practices. Use when writing SwiftUI views, managing state, or building Apple platform UIs.

plugins.name: wget-reader
plugins.description: Read and fetch data from URLs using wget. Use when asked to download content, fetch remote files, or read data from web URLs.

plugins.name: gitea-wiki
plugins.description: Manage Gitea wiki pages efficiently. Use when working with wiki content, creating documentation, or updating wiki pages. Handles base64 encoding/decoding via helper scripts.

plugins.name: git-worktree-workflow
plugins.description: Manage git worktrees for branch isolation. Use when creating feature branches, working on isolated tasks, creating PRs, and cleaning up after merge.

plugins.name: research-guide
plugins.description: Research best practices, guides, and libraries for any topic. Use when needing documentation, recommendations, implementation guidance, or library comparisons. Outputs detailed reports based on project context.
